marklogic.body:
Note to all terrorists around the world that want to wipe Israel Off the face of the earth...just try it!
And as for Jerusalem...it IS the capital of Israel...and one day my Holy Scriptures tell me that they will once again offer sacrifices in the Temple on the Spot where the sacrilege Dome of the Rock now stands...which means...world that Jerusalem is going to be undertaking a new look...and sooner than we all think according to the one, true and only 'living' GOD of Abraham, Isacc and Jakob.
So the Muslim our White House...and his counterpart SOS...are enemies of both Israel and America...in denying the facts of GOD's word!
GOD BLESS AMERICA AND OUR GREAT FRIEND AND ALLY ISRAEL...WE ARE WITH YOU...EVEN THOUGH THIS GOVERNMENT IS NOT!Â Â BUT THIS TOO SHALL PASS...AND IN NOVEMBER...WE ARE GOING TO CHANGE OUR GOVERNMENT!
